sbs.gamelogic

Class AIBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • sbs.gamelogic.Board
      • sbs.gamelogic.AIBoard

  • public class AIBoard
extends Board
    Class for the AI player's game board. Contains methods for populating the board randomly with the fleet

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sbs.gamelogic.Board

        acceptClick, board, column, row, ships

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ship place(int size)
      Attempts to place a ship on the board by going through a series of checks.
      void placeShips(int maxshipsize)
      Method that repeatedly calls the place method until the correct number of ships has been placed Ships are placed in order of descending sizes from the given maximum size down to the minimum of size 2

    • Method Detail

      • placeShips

        public void placeShips(int maxshipsize)
        Method that repeatedly calls the place method until the correct number of ships has been placed Ships are placed in order of descending sizes from the given maximum size down to the minimum of size 2
        Parameters:
        maxshipsize - the size of the longest ship

      • place

        public Ship place(int size)
        Attempts to place a ship on the board by going through a series of checks. Calls itself repeatedly until it hits a placement that is valid
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the ship being placed
        Returns:
        once a valid placement has been found, returns the ship to the placeships method
